title: BabyBandit
author: BabyBandit
created_time: December 09, 2023, 04:38:20 AMLast edit: December 09, 2023, 11:12:10 AM by BabyBandit
content: If this thread is in wrong place and should be in the Altcoin Discussion moderator feel free to move it there.Is it any users holding Bonk here and/or been holding it for a while? Maybe sold it already?   Seen a very positive outcome lately.  I bought some millions like a month ago and are on very good profit so far. Would be fun to discuss this Solana dog coin with someone else that also have some exp of this Solana dog coin?I think I am in to sell 50% if it reach ten times higher then it is at the moment. But not sure yet, I have 7/8-times my money already but don't want to miss if it drops to sell and buy again.https://www.coingecko.com/sv/coins/bonk

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: I've already sold as my thesis was that it would at least reach $PEPE, and then I'll bail. But for some reason, $BONK is now in #80, and $PEPE is stuck is $96. I definitely didn't expect $BONK to go this far not gonna lie — but the Solana ecosystem has been doing really really good.

comments.author: Tytanowy Janusz
comments.body: Quote from: BabyBandit on December 09, 2023, 04:38:20 AMIs it any users holding Bonk here and/or been holding it for a while? Maybe sold it already?   Seen a very positive outcome lately.  I bought some millions like a month ago and are on huge profit so far. Would be fun to discuss this Solana dog coin with someone else that also have some exp of this Solana dog coin?I think I am in to sell 50% if it reach ten times higher then it is at the moment. But not sure yet, I have 7/8-times my money already but don't want to miss if it drops to sell and buy again.https://www.coingecko.com/sv/coins/bonkI thought we were done with meme coins and yet people still fall for it. I'll say it as I always do in threads about meme coins. Stop supporting scammers and start supporting innovative technologies. "But this meme coin is different because it is on solana". who cares, it's a "funny name" evaluated by manipulated "investors" for $800 million.I would not expect 10x from todays price because it would push it to top10 CMC but, if you didn't sell yet than 50% now and 50% after binance listing would be a good exit strategy. If there are no obvious scams in the smart contract, I think that Binance will benefit from the volumes generated by Bonk. If there are no obvious scams in the smart contract, I think that Binance will not be able to resist the fee from the volumes that bonk generates. Especially since they have $4 billion to make up before they get another fine.

comments.author: batang_bitcoin
comments.body: I've seen it pumped and am very impressed with it. I guess the entire solana ecosystem is doing good and yet I have missed all the run on it. I'm an idiot that I am missing a lot of these runs but still, I'm holding on my best bet, Bitcoin. While it is currently on the peak, there's a fall on it so don't miss your profits if you can right now. Anyway, you are in a position now that you can do anything you want. Hold, sell or keep buying. But remember that it's a meme coin though it seems to have a solid community.

Hold, sell or keep buying. But remember that it's a meme coin though it seems to have a solid community.Nah bro your not an idiot, new trains will come that you will catch I am aware of that.   Yeah Bitcoin is number one without any competition and my Bonk profit will in the end be swapped to Bitcoin.Yes you have right its just a meme coin so it can start to fall very very fast so need to be cautious, but I don't think it's to late to jump on the Bonk train yet? But don't take my words as any fact, I am still a totally rookie in this.

comments.author: Tytanowy Janusz
comments.body: Quote from: BabyBandit on December 09, 2023, 09:32:59 AMSupport scammers and  innovative technologies? Fall for what? Making money? I will never be done with earning money and I don't think I am supporting a scammer because I am holding some Bonk. But maybe I misunderstood your point bro. And I haven't sold yet. I got a good stack with Bonk now and I am just sitting back and cozying up. This will end in a very good profit whatever happens next.   And thanks for the tip mate about Binance. Will check it out.Have a nice Saturday mate.In the casino you are also "making money"?. Dozens, if not hundreds, of meme coins are created every day. Most of them collapse on the same day. The chance of making x7 is probably 1:50. Why? Because meme coins have no value. It's just a name and a marketing machine. A marketing machine, commissions for listings on exchanges when there are no volumes yet, initial capital for pumping the price, commissions for pumping fake volume. These are all costs that developers must cover. They also make meme coins for money and not for charitable purposes. And since the project does not produce anything, the costs are covered 100% with money from the token dump on "investors". investors who play hot potato game or a zero-sum game. One earns while the other loses. A zero-sum game if the above-mentioned costs are ignored. If you add them up, it's a super negative sum game. This is a casino with a huge house edge. In good casinos, house edge (casino profits) are 1-5%. good casinos have a "provably fair" mechanism where you can verify this. Meme coins house edge it's probably 50-90%, it can't be determined or verified. In my opinion, this falls under the definition of a scam. Pump and dump itself is a scam. Go to casino and play crash game. you can also do x7, you also look at the growing chart and it may break at any time juse like meme coin, and at least you have a known and honest house edge.Don't say you make money from meme coins. It's like saying you're making money at the casino. This time you got it, next time you lose it, thats it.

comments.author: BabyBandit

Pump and dump itself is a scam.Don't say you make money from meme coins. It's like saying you're making money at the casino. This time you got it, next time you lose it, thats it.Ironic that a person that promotes mixer calling a coin a scam  , but it's only your opinion and it has no value for us that made profit from this coin, we have not scammed anyone & I have never scammed anyone and never would. I trading with coins that are completely legal. You know? I respect your point of view my friend and you can sit and hate meme coins and hold your bitcoins that's totally okay and I agree with the casino comparing. But just because you aren't smart enough to know how to make money from trading & meme coins doesn't mean it something bad. Try to learn it instead, your reply says more about your knowledge then meme coins, I am not good either but I try to learn and I improve everyday.   But of course, you will lose some and win some but if you smart and lucky enough to win more then you lose you are safe.But you are on point on many things meme coin's sky rocket for just falling very fast yes almost everyone of them does, but that's the whole point with trading meme coins, buy and sell fast. This is Trading Discussion and not hold long term discussion. So thank god meme coins are in this way, it's exactly that's why I love to trade with them. If you looking for long term holding you in the wrong place bud.And you know what? I been making money from meme coins and still will. & I also make money from casino's using sports betting.  Good luck with life my friend & have a great weekend.
